snippet.title: Shieven | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY SHIEVEN: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3394460/Shieven/

Step into the enigmatic Luminora Hospital, where, as an investigator on the brink of ruin, you take on a case that will test your courage. Amid dark rumors, you'll uncover terrifying secrets that have caused those who dared to delve too deep to vanish without a trace.

JOIN OUR DISCORD: https://discord.gg/sGKme59kpD
HELP US: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/byrodrix88/shieven-a-mysterious-horror-game
FOLLOW US: https://linktr.ee/Velicron_Innovations
